verses.arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَیۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِینَ
verses.translation: Woe to those who give less [than due],

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ یَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
verses.translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
Do they not think that they will be resurrected
For a tremendous Day -
The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

verses.arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِی سِجِّینࣲ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
Who deny the Day of Recompense.

verses.arabic: وَمَا یُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦۤ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِیمٍ
verses.translation: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

verses.arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَیۡهِ ءَایَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِیرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
verses.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

verses.arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ
verses.translation: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

verses.arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ یُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

verses.arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِی عِلِّیِّینَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
On adorned couches, observing.
You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

verses.arabic: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكࣱۚ وَفِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ فَلۡیَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
verses.translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
And its mixture is of Tasneem,
A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ أَجۡرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ یَضۡحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِینَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ لَضَاۤلُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

verses.arabic: فَٱلۡیَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ یَضۡحَكُونَ
verses.translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
On adorned couches, observing.

verses.arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَفۡعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
